name: Yuvasakthi
overview:
Yuvasakthi is a well established GIS company in India.Our specialized services are

  1. Data capture (Vector, Masspoints and Breaklines)

  2. GeoProcessing

  3. Map Preparation (Topographical maps, Cadastral Maps, Thematic maps, etc)

  4. Surface and Contour generation

  5. 3d Modeling (Building & Landscape)

  6. Parcel Mapping

  7. Model builder

  8. Raster Vector Conversions

  9. Cartography

  10. Land Mapping

  11. Data Migration

  12. Spatial Analysis

  13. Flood Mapping

  14. Risk Management Services

  15. Navigation Charts

  16. CAD conversion (2D & 3D)

  17. CAD drawings (Civil,Mechanical,Architectural,Electrical)

    Yuvasakthi having well experienced GIS professionals team network with well equipped office premise in India. We are interested to work for overseas GIS project opportunities on hourly basis & we are charging $3/hr. We assure our best services at best time.

Regards
